description:
freetype: optimize []byte to uint16/uint32 conversions.

Thanks to Jeff R. Allen <jra@nella.org> for the conversation that
led to this change.

benchmark              old ns/op    new ns/op    delta
BenchmarkDrawString     21168440     20143860   -4.84%

The number of mallocs per iteration is unchanged.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, jra@nella.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/freetype-go

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/freetype-go/source/detail?r=12c254407319 ***

freetype: optimize []byte to uint16/uint32 conversions.

Thanks to Jeff R. Allen <jra@nella.org> for the conversation that
led to this change.

benchmark              old ns/op    new ns/op    delta
BenchmarkDrawString     21168440     20143860   -4.84%

The number of mallocs per iteration is unchanged.

R=rsc, r
CC=golang-dev, jra

subject: code review 6304077: freetype: optimize []byte to uint16/uint32 conversions.
